synopsis: A collection of short stories revolving around a girl's first time! 1. Shounen no Susume (A Boy's Suggestion) [Shinjo Mayu] 2. Virgin Beast [Minami Kanan] 3. Daitan ni Ikou!!! (Become Daring) [Ayukawa Mio] 4. Itsumo Anata to Asagaeri! (When I'm with You, I Won't Be Home 'til Morning!) [Kousaka Yuuka] 5. Koigokoro (The Awakening of Love) [Sakurai Miya] 6. Kiss Kiss Kiss♥ ( Smooch Smooch Smooch) [Masuzaki Yoshino] 7. Amai Yokubou (Sweet Desires) [Shigano Iori]
